EMAIL.REQUIRED: Please enter a valid email address.

TEXT.NO_INITIAL_SPACE: It cannot start with a space.
TEXT.NO_TRAILING_SPACE: It cannot end with a space.
TEXT.USERNAME: It can only have letters and numbers.
TEXT.MAX_WORDS_BETWEEN: It must have between {{MIN}} and {{MAX}} words.

PASSWORD.EIGHT_LONG: It must be at least 8 characters long.
PASSWORD.ONE_NUMBER: It must contain at least one number.
PASSWORD.ONE_SPECIAL: It must contain at least one special character.
PASSWORD.ONE_UPPERCASE: It must contain at least one uppercase letter.
PASSWORD.ONE_LOWERCASE: It must contain at least one lowercase letter.

LOGIN.CREATE_SUBTITLE: It's free and always will be.
LOGIN.DATA_POLICY: By clicking Sign Up, you agree to our Terms, Data Policy and Cookies Policy.

TOOLTIP.SUBTITLE: Hover the input to see the icon 'i' and hover it to see the tooltip.

SKELETONS.SUBTITLE: To display a loading input, set the value of isLoading to true in the GTPageStateProvider.

BOXES.SUBTITLE: The 'isLoading' prop allows for dynamic loading of content within the component.

SWITCH.SUBTITLE: This feature allows you to toggle between two states: on and off.

BOX.SUBTITLE: You can add any component inside the box.

INPUTS.SUBTITLE: With a GTPageStateProvider, the only required step is to set the name and label of the input. It will handle the rest automatically.

BUTTONS.SUBTITLE: The button is designed to function optimally on both desktop and mobile devices.

SPACE.SUBTITLE: A versatile tool for creating consistent spacing between elements on your application.

TEXT.SUBTITLE: With its easy-to-use interface, you can quickly and easily add text to your application in a variety of styles and formats.

MODAL_BASIC.SUBTITLE: It allows users to interact with specific content or complete a task without navigating away from the current page.
MODAL_BASIC.BEFORE_CONFIRM: The onBeforeConfirm function is invoked prior to the execution of the onConfirm function. For now, it's set randomly to true or false.
MODAL_BASIC.BEFORE_CANCEL: The onBeforeCancel function is invoked prior to the execution of the onCancel function. For now, it's set randomly to true or false.
MODAL_BASIC.A_LOT_OF_CONTENT_BTN: Modal Example With A Lot Of Content
MODAL_BASIC.A_LOT_OF_CONTENT:
